memoiR

Templates to publish well-formatted documents both in HTML and PDF formats.

Gallery:

  • Memoir:
    • HTML GitBook
    • HTML Bootstrap 4 book
    • PDF, small-margin layout
    • PDF, wide-margin layout
  • Simple Article:
    • HTML Document
    • Downcute HTML
    • The distill article format which is the Stylish Article default, is available too.
    • The HTML Gitbook format is similar to that of the memoir template
    • PDF
  • Stylish Article:
    • PDF
    • distill
    • Other HTML outputs are identical to those of the Simple Article.
  • Beamer Presentation:
    • HTML IOSlide
    • HTML Slidy
    • PDF (Beamer)

A quick introduction is in vignette("memoiR").

The development version documentation is available here.
